00030 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.RSSHelper
00031 {
00035     public class Channel
00036     {
00037         #region Constructor
00038 
00039 
00040 
00041         public Channel()
00042         {
00043         }
00044 
00049         public Channel(XmlElement Element)
00050         {
00051             if (Element.Name.Equals("channel", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00052             {
00053                 foreach (XmlNode Child in Element.ChildNodes)
00054                 {
00055                     try
00056                     {
00057                         if (Child.Name.Equals("title", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00058                         {
00059                             Title = Child.InnerText;
00060                         }
00061                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("link", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00062                         {
00063                             Link = Child.InnerText;
00064                         }
00065                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("description", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00066                         {
00067                             Description = Child.InnerText;
00068                         }
00069                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("copyright", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00070                         {
00071                             Copyright = Child.InnerText;
00072                         }
00073                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("language", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00074                         {
00075                             Language = Child.InnerText;
00076                         }
00077                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("webmaster", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00078                         {
00079                             WebMaster = Child.InnerText;
00080                         }
00081                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("pubdate", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00082                         {
00083                             PubDate = DateTime.Parse(Child.InnerText);
00084                         }
00085                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("category", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00086                         {
00087                             Categories.Add(RSS.StripIllegalCharacters(Child.InnerText));
00088                         }
00089                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("docs", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00090                         {
00091                             Docs = Child.InnerText;
00092                         }
00093                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("ttl", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00094                         {
00095                             TTL = int.Parse(Child.InnerText);
00096                         }
00097                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("image", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00098                         {
00099                             foreach (XmlNode SubChild in Child.ChildNodes)
00100                             {
00101                                 if (SubChild.Name.Equals("url", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00102                                 {
00103                                     ImageUrl = SubChild.InnerText;
00104                                 }
00105                             }
00106                         }
00107                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("item", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00108                         {
00109                             Items.Add(new Item((XmlElement)Child));
00110                         }
00111                     }
00112                     catch { }
00113                 }
00114             }
00115         }
00116         #endregion
00117 
00118         #region Private Variables
00119         private string _Title = string.Empty;
00120         private string _Link = string.Empty;
00121         private string _Description = string.Empty;
00122         private string _Copyright = "Copyright " + DateTime.Now.ToString("yyyy") + ". All rights reserved.";
00123         private string _Language = "en-us";
00124         private string _webMaster = string.Empty;
00125         private DateTime _pubDate = DateTime.Now;
00126         private List<string> _Categories = null;
00127         private string _Docs = "http://blogs.law.harvard.edu/tech/rss";
00128         private string _Cloud = string.Empty;
00129         private int _TTL = 5;
00130         private string _ImageUrl = string.Empty;
00131         private List<Item> _Items = null;
00132         private bool _Explicit = false;
00133         #endregion
00134

00139         public bool Explicit
00140         {
00141             get
00142             {
00143                 return _Explicit;
00144             }
00145             set { _Explicit = value; }
00146         }
00150         public List<Item> Items
00151         {
00152             get
00153             {
00154                 if (_Items == null)
00155                 {
00156                     _Items = new List<Item>();
00157                 }
00158                 return _Items;
00159             }
00160             set { _Items = value; }
00161         }
00165         public string Title
00166         {
00167             get { return _Title; }
00168             set { _Title = RSS.StripIllegalCharacters(value); }
00169         }

00175         {
00176             get { return _Link; }
00177             set { _Link = value; }
00178         }

00184         {
00185             get { return _Description; }
00186             set { _Description = RSS.StripIllegalCharacters(value); }
00187         }

00192         public string Copyright
00193         {
00194             get { return _Copyright; }
00195             set { _Copyright = value; }

00229         {

00235                 }
00236                 return _Categories;

00238             set { _Categories = value; }

00278         public override string ToString()
00279         {
00280             StringBuilder ChannelString = new StringBuilder();
00281             ChannelString.Append("<channel>");
00282             ChannelString.Append("<title>" + Title + "</title>\r\n");
00283             ChannelString.Append("<link>" + Link + "</link>\r\n");
00284             ChannelString.Append("<atom:link xmlns:atom=\"http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom\" rel=\"self\" href=\"" + Link + "\" type=\"application/rss+xml\" />");
00285 
00286             ChannelString.Append("<description><![CDATA[" + Description + "]]></description>\r\n");
00287             ChannelString.Append("<language>" + Language + "</language>\r\n");
00288             ChannelString.Append("<copyright>" + Copyright + "</copyright>\r\n");
00289             ChannelString.Append("<webMaster>" + WebMaster + "</webMaster>\r\n");
00290             ChannelString.Append("<pubDate>" + PubDate.ToString("Ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH':'mm':'ss") + "</pubDate>\r\n");
00291             ChannelString.Append("<itunes:explicit>" + (Explicit ? "yes" : "no") + "</itunes:explicit>");
00292             ChannelString.Append("<itunes:subtitle>" + Title + "</itunes:subtitle>");
00293             ChannelString.Append("<itunes:summary><![CDATA[" + Description + "]]></itunes:summary>");
00294             
00295             foreach (string Category in Categories)
00296             {
00297                 ChannelString.Append("<category>" + Category + "</category>\r\n");
00298                 ChannelString.Append("<itunes:category text=\"" + Category + "\" />\r\n");
00299             }
00300             ChannelString.Append("<docs>" + Docs + "</docs>\r\n");
00301             ChannelString.Append("<ttl>" + TTL.ToString() + "</ttl>\r\n");
00302             if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ImageUrl))
00303             {
00304                 ChannelString.Append("<image><url>" + ImageUrl + "</url>\r\n<title>" + Title + "</title>\r\n<link>" + Link + "</link>\r\n</image>\r\n");
00305             }
00306             foreach (Item CurrentItem in Items)
00307             {
00308                 ChannelString.Append(CurrentItem.ToString());
00309             }
00310             ChannelString.Append("</channel>\r\n");
00311             return ChannelString.ToString();
00312         }
00313     }
